comment: One of the worst professors I have ever taken. She rambles on in class and doesn't really teach much, listening to her lectures is more confusing than informative. The homework and lectures are very different from the test. The tests are basically trivia questions so even if you have a 100 for quizzes and homework be prepared to fail the tests.

Online only class. 95% Connect based. She does require discussion post weekly. Didn't get anything from them really. I read the text in Connect, watch the corresponding video's in Connect and took all quizzes and test through Connect. I'm not sure why I don't just take Connect courses, literally didn't gain anything directly from Stephenson.

ACCT 4200: The content she teaches in class is opposite of what is in her quizes and exams. I had no option so took her. No idea what she was talking about in class because her quizes are opposite of what she taught. dnt take her. 2 online exams and 1 final in class, 1 group project that was easy for 4 pages. its a waste to come to her class.

Dr S, is solid because accounting is going to be hard no matter what professor you take. She really wants her students to pass just complete the hw and quizzes on time and you will do well. There is a final project so make sure to start early. Participate in the group discussions those are easy points. If you turn in assignments on time your golden

Do not walk into this class expecting it to be easy. With that being said, after I took her in the summer I could really tell she cares about her students and wants them to be successful. As long you go to class and pay attention you will get a B, if you work hard you will get an A. I would for sure take her again!
rating_tags: Respected--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Stephenson is a good choice but a little on the sarcastic side. She is very good at clarifying what is being taught. Reading the book really helps. The test are also not hard if you know the material.

Lectures are obtuse and disorganized, she makes the subject matter more complicated and confusing. She regularly makes mistakes during lectures. She quickly, gets defensive when questioned about anything. She often responds in a rude fashion to even the most innocuous questions. Required a high level of self-learning. Avoid at all costs.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Tests are tough

comment: The worst Professor at KSU! Youll have a 20 question test over 9 Chpts so you have to study so hard to be tested on a few things. The project was easy but no clear grading rubric, assignments aren't clearly graded either & she won't go over them so you can do better on the next one. She is the rudest women and will never admit she's wrong!
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Tests? Not many--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Drop this class asap. She never went through the test questions, super hard homework that nothing look like what she taught you in class and 2 essays.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS--TEST HEAVY

comment: She does not go through the lectures very well and the in class examples were not helpful. The reviews for the exams were not even close to what was on the exams. The homework is absolutely mandatory and if you don't do them, you will not do well on the 3 exams. I advise looking for another teacher for this class.
Clearly teaches materials in an easy format. Involves class in problem solving. Breaks it down to class. KSU needs more of these kinds of teachers who know what teaching methods work.

She knows her stuff but she does not know how to teach it. Her exams are nothing like she goes over in class. I went to every class and still struggled. Very condescending and rude. I don't like the way she spoke to some students who asked questions regarding a problem. She spoke to you as if you should know it. I wouldn't take her again
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: DONT NOT TAKE CLASS.  (A TEACHER THAT DOESNT TEACH) Tests are nothing like what is gone over in class. AT ALL COSTS, DO NOT TAKE HER. She is more concerned with her image than teaching students. Doesn't take questions because she DOESNT KNOW the answers. A pathetic excuse for a teacher. EXTREMELY IGGNORANT in accounting

Class was unstructured and added almost no value to my learning. She comes unprepared to class and does not teach. Be prepared to self-study for hours if you want to do decent. Even then, I knew students who did that and couldn't even make a B on the course.

I had a 4.0 GPA before this class. I did the work. Went to every class. Read the book. Took my own notes. Studied. I struggled!!!!! You're basically teaching yourself. Goes off topic, doesn't use excel, doesn't go over examples, doesn't offer help and gets angry frequently. Got complaints on a regular basis but never changed. DON'T TAKE

ACCT2200 Prof. Stephenson was by far the worst teacher I have ever had. Her lectures go on and on about info that has nothing to do with the HW or test. This is a math based class but she spends about 5-10 mins of her lectures on math ant the rest on nonsense.  She can't stay on topic and then gets extremely angry at the class for it. DO NOT TAKE
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT OFFERED

comment: She just plain sucks. I took her class twice because I had no choice. She does not teach, her tests are very hard and she does not care about her students actually understanding the material. She just goes through the steps and If you don't get it, well too bad so sad. I had to teach myself everything.  DO NOT TAKE HER FOR THE LOVE OF GOD DO NOT.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--TEST HEAVY--EXTRA CREDIT OFFERED

comment: Reads from a power point.  Doesn't explain anything well.  If you have a question you are better off figuring out the answer yourself as she does not explain things well.  Participation stuff after each chapter as part of your grade.  Does give you the chance for extra credit though which is nice.  Would not take again.
Very amateur teacher. will get offended when students do not understand the material.  Would defiantly not take her again, and would not recommend her.

I enjoyed her class. She gives so many opportunities for extra points, she's funny, she helps if you ask her during office hours or after class. she gets frustrated easily and is scatter brained so you have to watch your grades, but if you tell her you were there for an assignment she gave you a 0 on she will change it. I enjoyed the class!!

I DO NOT recommend this teacher. I'm not even done with the semester and I'm not sure how I'm going to get through it. I'm a straight A student and I can barely make a C+ on her tests. She's NOT an easy A and she is the least helpful teacher I've ever had. She won't answer your questions and doesn't directly teach at all. Take someone else.

Dr. Stephenson is a great professor, gives a lot bonuses, funny, and cares about her students' academic progress. She had some complaints about her, but I don't think it was her fault; it was the material handed to her. Work hard and she will work with you to get a passing grade. You will pass even if you fail a test as long as you do everything.

Professor Stephenson will help you, knows the material and does want you to pass. However, her lecturing style is in painful need of better powerpoints, more organized lecturing format and a more exciting lecturing style. I understand her dilemma in that the material can be rather boring to a non-major. The class is passable, but you better study.

anyone can make an A in this class. she gives out A LOT of extra credit! although attendance is not mandatory, she gives out extra credit for students who go to class. all exams are multiple choice. look at the pre-quizzes! questions  on the exams are identical to the pre-quizzes. take her if you just want to pass!

Nice Professor. Take her class if you're mature & can read & come to class with questions. She was late but half class was never there. This is college not H.S.. Professors introduce you to concepts, you go hm read and come back w/ questions. If you think a professor can teach you basic acct twice a wk for 1 hr ea. & you don't read, you're crazy.

She doesn't teach!!!! And honestly, a lot of people say that she's so easy, well let me tell you honestly there's only so much you can do without any guidance. She was always LATE and very CONDESCENDING. Could you get an A definitely, but it is very hard to get up and go to her class. NOT WORTH IT if you can get another teacher.

Kind of unclear; it's true if you want to learn accounting don't take her; but overall it's a very easy class.  Only one case study to do and one group project which is also easy.  She gives pre-exam quizzes which contain most of the test questions, but if you want an "A" read the chapter and study the pre-exam quiz.  Definitely take her
4 test- read the chapters and you'll be fine. 2 projects(as long as you do them you'll get a 100% of it. Quizzes are in teams!! Easy class!!! (She's almost always late!)

Don't take this class if you really want to learn a lot. But take this class if you just want to pass. You can make an easy A. I made an easy A, but I didn't study at all. I should have taken different prof because now I decided to major in Accounting. I need to know real accounting materials.

This class is a joke.  She was late to every class and there were times when she was fixing her hair during the lecture.  Needless to say I didn't attend often.  Although reading the other posts make me wish I at least came for the pre-exams or asked her to change my grade.

easiest professor i've ever had.  She is a caring lady, but just doesn't know what she is doing.  If you don't like your grade, tell her and she'll change it.  our final exam accidentally had the answer sheet printed on it.  i never went to class and if you study the review questions you will find they are the exact same questions on the test.
study the sample exams and you will pass

She hardly ever knows what the @#*! she's talking about.  Half the time it's a student that ends up explaining the material to the class.  On the plus side, she gives pretests that make up over 75% of the tests.  Just take those, and you'll get an A.
She knows everything about accounting, but she is just not a very good educator. She padded the grades well though. Tests were LONG and sometimes over material we didn't really discuss.

Quirky must be her favorite word -- youll see. Many students in my class were not fair to her. She is a good teacher though she might pad grades a little too excessively. Its not the teacher for Acct 2200 - its the material -- its no JoKe!!!
